message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $10,800 for the product. I hope this proposal meets somewhere in between our values.
